example.name: autogen1
example.text: a $ 475 million debenture offering by Chicago & North Western Acquisition Corp. that was still being negotiated late last night
example.arg: by Chicago & North Western Acquisition Corp.

example.name: autogen2
example.text: For each $ 1,000 face amount of debentures , holders received $ 250 of Series B 11 % senior secured convertible notes due Oct. 15 , 1998 , and 200 common shares .
